TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebEventCustomEvaluator

summary.span: 计算是否将某个事件发送给相关的提供程序以进行处理。

span.span: Evaluates whether an event should be sent to the related provider for processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 此接口允许启用或禁用特定事件的激发。This interface allows enabling or disabling the firing of a specific event. 当你实现自己的自定义事件，并且想要控制将其发送到相关提供程序进行处理的速率时，此方法特别有用。This is especially useful when you implement your own custom event and want to control the rate at which it is sent to the related provider for processing. > [!NOTE] > 此接口不控制事件的引发频率。This interface does not control how often the event is raised. 它仅控制将事件信息发送到提供程序进行处理的频率。It only controls how often the event information is sent to the provider for processing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 创建自定义事件时从接口派生。The following code example shows how to derive from the interface when creating a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#1)] 下面是配置文件的摘录，使 ASP.NET 可以使用 方法来确定是否必须将引发的事件发送到提供程序进行处理。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the method to decide whether the raised event must be sent to the provider for processing. ``` ```

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

summary.span: 计算是否应该引发某个事件。

span.span: Evaluates whether an event should be raised.

returns.span: 如果应引发该事件则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the event should be raised; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果自定义事件计算器返回 `true` ，则会引发事件，并由关联的提供程序对其进行处理。If the custom event evaluator returns `true`, the event is raised and then processed by the associated provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的自定义实现 。The following code example shows a custom implementation of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#22)]
